meanings.definition: Deepeners: Things that make something deeper or more intense.
meanings.sent1: The use of deepeners in the painting brought out the emotions more.
meanings.sent2: She added deepeners to the story to create a more impactful ending.
meanings.sent3: The deepeners in the music made everyone feel like they were in a dream.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as deepeners, pulling her into a world of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The deepeners in the movie made the audience feel like they were part of the story.

meanings.definition: Deepeners: People or things that deepen or increase the depth of something.
meanings.sent1: The deepeners in the team helped them achieve success.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the deepeners in the field of research.
meanings.sent3: The deepeners in the group always had a way of making things more interesting.
meanings.sent4: His presence acted as a deepener, making the atmosphere more profound.
meanings.sent5: The deepeners in the conversation brought out new perspectives and ideas.
